InstructionData.Title: GFS_-_GAS_FILTRATION_CONTROLLER_-_O2
InstructionData.Author: D4RK GH0ST
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Script name: Gas Filtration Controller # Description: # Author: Werner L. Gottschalt ## START
# StructureActiveVent define hActVent -1129453144 define targetPressure 19100
# Define the Name Hashes define nActVent HASH("O2 - Active Vent")
sbn hActVent nActVent Lock 1 sbn hActVent nActVent Mode 1 sbn hActVent nActVent PressureInternal 35000
start: yield l r0 db PressureOutput slt r0 r0 targetPressure # If r0 == 0 go to disableFiltration beqz r0 disableFiltration # If r0 == 1 go to enableFiltration bnez r0 enableFiltration j start
enableFiltration: yield s db Mode r0 sbn hActVent nActVent On r0
l r0 db PressureOutput slt r0 r0 targetPressure
beqz r0 disableFiltration j enableFiltration
disableFiltration: yield move r0 0 s db Mode r0 sbn hActVent nActVent On r0 j start
## END
